translations: v．乘直升机：乘坐直升机旅行或运输。
· The injured hiker was helicoptered out of the mountains.
受伤的徒步旅行者被直升机从山上运送出来。

sentences.sentence: Built off site, the LEAPs are actually helicoptered into their desired sites.
sentences.translation: 内置场外，飞跃实际上直升机到他们所需的网站。

sentences.sentence: The wealthy elite are helicoptered in. Factory workers arrive on cramped coaches.
sentences.translation: 有钱的精英乘直升飞机而临，工厂的工人坐着拥挤的车厢而至。
